author: mattbaird
msg: Found a leaked resource in the MySQL sequence manager, we weren't closing the statement and the resultset. Uses the new platform-aware close method in a finally block now.

author: mattbaird
msg: use new platform-aware close on resultsetandstatement in the finally block to avoid leaking resources. Also use NOT_SCROLLABLE query for performance reasons.

author: mattbaird
msg: use scrollable param for performance reasons, also use the new platform-aware close statement in a finally block to avoid leaking.

author: mattbaird
msg: fix some potential leaks, and add scrollable parameter. Using scrollable cursors is a burden on performance, so we'll want to have these scrollable parameters bubble all the way up to the client.

author: mattbaird
msg: add platform-aware 'close' method to the resultsetandstatement object
